title: JQH’s Embassy Suites by Hilton Des Moines Downtown Gains Several Top Accolades
text:
Thumbnail July 02, 2015 03:21 PM   
SPRINGFIELD, Mo. & DES MOINES, Iowa-  John Q. Hammons Hotels & Resorts (JQH) today announced the 234-suite Embassy Suites by Hilton Des Moines Downtown that the 50-plus year company operates in Iowa is the recent recipient of numerous top accolades, including the prestigious TripAdvisor ® Certificate of Excellence Hall of Fame Award. The special designation recognizes businesses that have been awarded a Certificate of Excellence for five years in a row from TripAdvisor, the world’s largest travel site*. Springfield, Mo.-based JQH is the largest private, independent owner and manager of hotels in the United States. The company also operates more than 5.4 million gross square feet of superb meeting and convention space. 
In addition, the Embassy Suites by Hilton Des Moines Downtown secured the Excellence in Quality Award by Hilton Worldwide for attaining five consecutive outstanding quality assurance evaluations based on guest and brand feedback. The upscale hotel was named Employer of the Year by Goodwill Industries of Central Iowa and honored with Iowa Lodging Association’s 2014 Community Service of the Year Award. 
With a customer service-focused culture, the hotel was recently recognized with the 2014 Embassy Suites Front Office Manager of the Year Award. Riann Hornbuckle, hotel guest service manager, was acknowledged for outstanding performance in operational excellence, as well as for superior results in guest service and revenue maximization. 
“We appreciate regular dialogue with guests, such as traveler reviews and service recognition, allowing us to be more in tune with their changing needs and to help deliver on our goal of exceeding guests’ expectations,” said Skip Hammerman, general manager, Embassy Suites by Hilton Des Moines Downtown. 
Community Service at the Core 
Giving back to the community, through monetary and in-kind donations, service and charitable events, is an operating pillar of the Embassy Suites by Hilton Des Moines Downtown. In 2014, the hotel participated in on-site and off-site fund-raising for assisting various health & wellness causes, feeding the hungry, and helping area animal shelters, among other initiatives. A sampling of activities includes partnering with the American Cancer Society to provide rooms for patients in town for treatment; collecting more than 3,000 lbs. of non-perishable food items for the Food Bank of Iowa during the annual hotel food drive; and repurposing hotel linens for use at local animal shelters. 
Food & Beverage Expertise 
The Embassy Suites by Hilton Des Moines Downtown has established a reputation for providing a wonderful dining experience. Liberty’s – An Iowa Grill –, the hotel’s on-site restaurant, offers modern American cuisine. The property’s full-service banquet expertise is ideal for small meetings or large-scale, multi-day events. New menus from award-winning Chef Jeff Deets present an array of delicious culinary creations made from scratch. Healthy options and dietary considerations, including gluten-free, vegetarian and vegan, are available. 
About Embassy Suites by Hilton Des Moines Downtown 
The 234-suite, award-winning Embassy Suites by Hilton Des Moines Downtown in Iowa features 15,000 square feet of flexible, single-level meeting and convention space. Located at 101 East Locust Street in downtown Des Moines, the upscale hotel is just steps from The Principal Riverwalk and near trendy eateries and shopping. Renovated in 2012, the tastefully decorated hotel features amenities such as 37-inch LCD HDTVs, WiFi and Internet access, beautiful local artwork, an open-air atrium, indoor pool and fitness center. Guests can also enjoy several complimentary options including: cooked-to-order breakfast, Evening Reception** offering refreshing beverages, and shuttle to Des Moines airport and local downtown area. For more information, call (515) 244-1700, go to www.embassysuitesdesmoines.com , or connect with the hotel on Facebook . 
About Embassy Suites by Hilton 
Embassy Suites by Hilton, one of Hilton Worldwide’s 12 market-leading brands, is dedicated to delivering what matters most to travelers. The full service, upscale brand offers every guest a two-room suite, free made-to-order breakfast and a nightly two-hour reception with complimentary drinks and snacks. Both leisure and business travelers looking for a relaxed, yet sophisticated experience will feel right at home with brand-standard amenities like inviting atriums and complimentary 24-hour business and fitness centers. Embassy Suites by Hilton has 222 hotels with nearly 40 in the pipeline. For more information, visit www.embassysuites.com , and connect with Embassy Suites by Hilton at news.embassysuites.com , www.facebook.com/embassysuiteshotels and www.twitter.com/EmbassySuites . 
About Hilton Worldwide 
Visit news.hiltonworldwide.com for more information and connect with Hilton Worldwide at www.facebook.com/hiltonworldwide , www.twitter.com/hiltonworldwide , www.youtube.com/hiltonworldwide , www.flickr.com/hiltonworldwide , and www.linkedin.com/company/hilton-worldwide . 
About John Q. Hammons Hotels & Resorts 
Springfield, Mo.-based John Q. Hammons Hotels & Resorts (JQH) is the largest private, independent owner and manager of hotels in the United States, representing brands such as: Marriott, Hilton, Embassy Suites by Hilton, Sheraton, IHG, Chateau on the Lake Resort / Spa & Convention Center, and Plaza Hotels Collection. With a portfolio of 75 hotels representing nearly 19,000 guest rooms/suites in 24 states, JQH’s properties are dominant in their markets. Founded on the extraordinary vision of John Q. Hammons and built on his continued legacy of excellence spanning more than 50 years, JQH has become one of the most recognized and award-winning companies in the hospitality industry. Built to be the best, John Q. Hammons Hotels & Resorts continues to set the standard in hospitality management and hotel development. Go to www.jqhhotels.com for more information, or connect with JQH at www.facebook.com/jqhhotelsresorts , https://twitter.com/jqhhotelsresort or www.linkedin.com/company/john-q-hammons-hotels-&-resorts .
